author: Mantasha
text: He once said, to expect the world to be fair is like expecting bull not to hit you because you aren't wearing red. I laughed heartily. Little did I know that the burden of killing or not killing the bull after it hits you isn't as light as bull's instinct. It hurts either ways.

author: Mantasha
text:
Customer(helplessly): I couldn't withdraw 5k on Eid

J&KB(no apology): I did business for 1082 crores!

All clap 👏👏
classic case of defensiveness,poor communication & diversion from the topic.Also, won't improve. 
JKB is no exception,this is our South Asian substitute for Sorry

author: Mantasha
text: What's with the people who say that they don't wake up by alarm clock? Are they lazy, don't care enough, or they actually can't wake up by the sound of the alarm going off?

author: Mantasha
text: The creator's mercy surpasses the creation's wrongs, if  the creation realises & makes amends ~ sending prayers on the night of forgiveness and power.

author: Mantasha
text:
Thank god for an institution like SKIMS (@DIRECTORSKIMS) and thank god for compassionate docs @imi_haf, @drtalibkhan & others. There's no doubt that a lot needs to be achieved but there's a lot that is silently done, everyday.
Just an appreciation tweet ❤️ https://t.co/1dlsTghRo6

author: Mantasha
text:
Love is to submit, love is to serve,
Love is to get yet love is to let go. https://t.co/5XQQ7tTOn5

author: Mantasha
text: So, the cake was delicious and my evening was fun. It is a pleasure to meet new & genuine people while as keeping your old ones who you know have your back, rain or sunshine! Life is such a beautiful journey and I am so grateful for everything. https://t.co/X6DIM3jG4R

author: Mantasha
text:
We thrive in respect & co-existence, 
We perish in hatred & intolerance. Nature hints that despite differences we all are one, 
Yet we promote & incentivise othering everyone.
Commonalities shall surpass the diversions,
If only we learn to be united in our diversity & divisions. https://t.co/7wU0jODPhN

author: Mantasha
text: Good food still remains a luxury for many. Grateful for what we have and generous for what we give away for others to have, inshallah. https://t.co/Vbd1Z4uzTl

author: Mantasha
text:
NEP-2020: J&K plans to shift Board exam session to March.

No more exams in shivering cold months, what a relief for students! 

SSB, JKPSC, and other recruitment agencies and bodies must also avoid scheduling exams in winter as it makes absolutely no sense. Never made any.

text:

author: Mantasha
text:
Food that we eat needs to monitored. What's available in the market needs to be passed after stringent testing. High time for an FDA like agency.
Who knows what restaurants cook?
Who knows what goes into milk, fruits, poultry & vegetables?
*Needs immediate attention* https://t.co/2ECSyeFcAe

author: Mantasha
text:
"While Kashmir Pandits have lost their homes, Kashmiri Muslims remain jailed in their houses. That’s what three decades of armed insurgency has given the collective Kashmiri society."

author: Mantasha
text:
No amount of traffic management can serve as substitute for robust public transport system. Period. 
On the contrary, a robust public transport system is solution to most of the transport woes: traffic congestion, expensive fuel, air pollution, smaller roads, parking issues etc.

author: Mantasha
text: Survival: my cruelest vocation is to rationalize my emotions. https://t.co/6dNcsVsN8B

author: Mantasha
text: Kashmir is in perpetual pain and the episodes of this pain occur nearly every day. One of the most heinous was when Kashmiri Pandits moved out of Kashmir in distress. Yet, one episode occurred yesterday too. The pain must end for all Kashmiris with compassion and acceptance. https://t.co/oerA9yDyG4

author: Mantasha
text:
Qila Hari Parbat on Kohi Maraan in Srinagar built by Mughal king Akbar and then Afghan governor Ata Khan (16th-18th century). The legend goes that the hillock was formed by pebbles that mynas (haer in Kashmiri) threw to scare away the twin demons.
#kwctreks https://t.co/TA1QdmrsX7

author: Mantasha
text: A friend said his cousin who otherwise looked happy committed suicide. It isn't only money, status & power that fulfills a human. Peace is more important. Hence the greeting Om shanti, Asalamualaikum & Shalom. May peace prevail within us, in our homes, societies, and the world.

author: Mantasha
text: As I seek forgiveness on this night from the creator, I seek forgiveness from God's creation too. Incase I, my family, friends, or community, wronged any one of you, please forgive. Let us be hopeful for a better future, a more peaceful world. It is hard but not impossible.

author: Mantasha
text:
Holi comes in Phalgun, brings cheer & color. Barat brings forgiveness and prosperity.
Holika Dahan symbolises prevalence of truth. Nisf Shaban symbolises salvation of souls.
Many are busy hating,nature reminds of co existence. Shivratri & Mairaj,Holi & Barat. Love & Prayers 💕

author: Mantasha
text:
Lessons from the documentary, Mission Joy:

1. Well being is a cultivable skill.
2. Joy is within.
3. Forgiveness is for the strong.
4. Going through suffering can make us compassionate (most profound) 
5. Pray and meditate. Help people around you.

https://t.co/gVTunYqjRC
